name: Golden Fig & Pistachio Biscotti
description: Experience a refined twist on a classic treat with our Golden Fig & Pistachio Biscotti. Handcrafted in small batches, each biscotti features sun-dried Turkish figs and premium roasted pistachios, combined in a delicately crisp Italian-style dough. Perfect for pairing with coffee, tea, or dessert wine, these elegant cookies offer a harmonious balance of sweetness and nuttiness. Free from artificial preservatives and made with all-natural ingredients, they’re a thoughtful gift or a sophisticated indulgence for any occasion.

attributes.ingredients: wheat flour, dried figs, pistachios, cane sugar, eggs, butter, natural flavors
